text: Let's be honest, celebrities have some of the best skin in the world, but the cost of the constantly flawless skin can be astronomical. But, some celebs aren't immune from falling in love with drugstore beauty products and, thankfully, most of them are pretty open to sharing their favorite products with us plebeians. Below, 13 celebrities reveal their favorite drugstore cleansers for smooth, healthy-looking skin.
title: 9 drugstore cleansers that celebrities swear by

meta_data.title: 9 drugstore cleansers that celebrities swear by

meta_data.description: It may seem like every celebrity spends thousands on their skin-care routine but sometimes, stars really are like us, and they actually use cleansers that won't break the bank. We rounded up some drugstore cleansers that celebrities have bragged about.
meta_data.author: Marilyn La Jeunesse
